group_1.textCenter: (The more I think about it, the more I despise@myself...)
(I cannot clearly deny that I have hunted for life@as a distraction...)
(Hunted without a purpose, it just died in vain...)
(Given that we too are entangled in the fate of@Magical Girls,
I have to think about how to approach life@once again...)

group_1.textLeft: Good morning.@I see Kuroda is accompanying you today?

group_1.textRight: What, is there somethin' wrong with that?

group_1.textLeft: On the contrary, you two are always together,@so I think nothing of it.

group_1.textRight: Are we with each other THAT often?

group_1.textLeft: We've been friends since childhood, plus we@never act all flirty with each other.
We go to school together and are both on the@Festival Committee.
To people around us, it sure looks like we've been@together forever.

group_1.textRight: Ah... When I think about it, yeah.@How embarrassing to realize that...

group_1.textLeft: Hey, what, you don't like hanging out with me?

group_1.textRight: Nah, that's not it. Anyway, what was that about@the monument again?

group_1.textLeft: Say, Miura, would you be willing to let me@interview you sometime?
What? But I'm not very good at that kind of thing...

group_1.textRight: If we're going to do an exhibit on the monument,@we need more content.
I'll include an interview with a college professor.
But wouldn't it be more interesting to have an@interview with the first discoverer?
It's better to view the story of the monument@from different perspectives.
It adds credibility somehow, doesn't it?
"Because without any elements lending to its@credibility, it might as well be non-existent."
I'd like to enrich the contents if possible.

group_1.textLeft: ...I believe you've said the same thing before.
Just having a connection with the outside world@could very well bring about change...
The three of us are all prisoners in the same cell,@with nobody coming to visit us.

group_1.textRight: Currently, nobody knows or understands our@sorrow and suffering.

group_1.textLeft: I suppose so, yes.@There's a point in letting it be known.

group_1.textRight: So? Would you like to come along with me@for the interview?

group_1.textLeft: Because in order to be recognized and believed,@it is necessary.

group_1.narration: I wonder if Kuroda and Haitani will believe me@if I tell them about my status as a Magical Girl@and my destiny to become a Witch.
I wonder if they will believe my story@as they believe the Fugitive Heike Clan Legend,@which was never substantiated.
Himuro-dono said that she wanted fleeting@sympathy or even just feeble encouragement.
There is a similar feeling in me,@who has unconsciously used hunting for life@as an outlet for my anxieties, with roots@in places unseen...
Will Kuroda and Haitani believe me?@Will they trust what I say,@and feel sorry for me?

group_1.textCenter: (But we must not tell. We are a secret...)
(That's just how it is with Magical Girls...)
